name: Attuned
description:
Instruments! Always detuning so very swiftly. (and sometimes even retuning themselves!)

In fact, it feels no longer than 10 seconds until stuff breaks around here...

Please listen closely and take care of this severe issue, we are counting on you!

Created for Ludum Dare 51 within 48h (well, more like 14h actually :)) for the theme "Every 10 seconds"
